short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to practice taking a quiz on Canvas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows students to practice Canvas assessments and quizzes they have already completed. By re-taking these assessments, students can reinforce their knowledge and prepare for future evaluations.
